recipe

Ingredients

Brown Rice 1 cup
Water 1.5 cup

679 calories

9 sodium

0 cost (Brown Rice Data Missing)

0 sugar (Brown Rice Data Missing)

0 protein (Brown Rice Data Missing)

Vegan Recipe

Estimated Time: 29 Minutes

Put 1 cup Brown Rice in instant pot
Put in 1½ cups Water
Async 24 minutes Pressure cook on high pressure for 15 minutes, (Preheat takes 9 min)
Timer 5 minutes Let instant pot sit without opening steam valve
Open steam valve
Take inner instant pot bowl out and put on stove. Put away instant pot.

Vegan Recipe

Estimated Time: 10 Minutes

Put ½ cup Brown Rice in instant pot
Put in 1 cup Water
Async 7 minutes Pressure cook on high pressure for 7 minutes, (Preheat takes 0 min)
Timer 3 minutes let sit without opening steam valve
Open steam valve
